topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Installation Best Practices

body.p: When deploying HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade, review the following best practices.

section.title: Perform a Backup After Installation
section.p: After deployment is complete and cloud is configured with work loads, do a full backup of the cloud. This will make it easier to recover should you encounter a problem.
For more information, see Backup and Restore Configuration Files
